mapper.select:
select * from metoo_terminal
AND v4ip IS NOT NULL
AND v6ip is not null and v4ip is null
SELECT terminal.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM metoo_mac WHERE v4ip IS NULL AND v6ip IS NULL ) mac JOIN metoo_terminal terminal ON mac.mac = terminal.mac where terminal.type = 0

SELECT terminal.id, terminal.deviceTypeId, terminal.type, mac.mac, mac.port, mac.deviceIp, -- IF(terminal.tag = 'VDT', null, mac.deviceName) as deviceName, mac.deviceName, mac.tag, mac.hostname, mac.remoteDevice, mac.remotePort, mac.v4ip, mac.v4ip1, mac.v4ip2, mac.v4ip3, mac.v4ipDynamic, mac.v4ip1Dynamic, mac.v4ip2Dynamic, mac.v4ip3Dynamic, mac.v6ip, mac.v6ip1, mac.v6ip2, mac.v6ip3, mac.v6ipDynamic, mac.v6ip1Dynamic, mac.v6ip2Dynamic, mac.v6ip3Dynamic, mac.client_hostname, mac.deviceUuid as deviceUuid2, mac.deviceName2, mac.deviceIp2, mac.macVendor as macVendor, mac.devicePort2 FROM ( SELECT *, IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip ), 0 ) AS v4ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip1 ), 0 ) AS v4ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip2 ), 0 ) AS v4ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip3 ), 0 ) AS v4ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip ), 0 ) AS v6ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip1 ), 0 ) AS v6ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip2 ), 0 ) AS v6ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip3 ), 0 ) AS v6ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT client_hostname FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip LIMIT 1 ), NULL ) AS client_hostname FROM metoo_mac mac WHERE tag in('DT', 'VDT') ) mac
join
metoo_terminal terminal on terminal.mac = mac.mac /* and terminal.port = mac.port*/ /*and terminal.type = 0*/

SELECT mac.addTime, mac.mac, mac.port, mac.deviceIp, -- IF(terminal.tag = 'VDT', null, mac.deviceName) as deviceName, mac.deviceName, mac.tag, mac.hostname, mac.remoteDevice, mac.remotePort, mac.v4ip, mac.v4ip1, mac.v4ip2, mac.v4ip3, mac.v4ipDynamic, mac.v4ip1Dynamic, mac.v4ip2Dynamic, mac.v4ip3Dynamic, mac.v6ip, mac.v6ip1, mac.v6ip2, mac.v6ip3, mac.v6ipDynamic, mac.v6ip1Dynamic, mac.v6ip2Dynamic, mac.v6ip3Dynamic, mac.client_hostname, mac.macVendor, mac.deviceUuid as deviceUuid2, mac.deviceName2, mac.deviceIp2, mac.devicePort2 FROM ( SELECT *, IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip ), 0 ) AS v4ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip1 ), 0 ) AS v4ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip2 ), 0 ) AS v4ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip3 ), 0 ) AS v4ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip ), 0 ) AS v6ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip1 ), 0 ) AS v6ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip2 ), 0 ) AS v6ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip3 ), 0 ) AS v6ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT client_hostname FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip LIMIT 1 ), NULL ) AS client_hostname FROM metoo_mac mac WHERE tag in('DT', 'VDT') ) mac LEFT JOIN metoo_terminal terminal ON terminal.mac = mac.mac WHERE terminal.mac IS NULL /* and (mac.v4ip is not null or mac.v6ip is not null)*/

/*SELECT terminal.id FROM ( SELECT *, IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip ), 0 ) AS v4ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip1 ), 0 ) AS v4ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip2 ), 0 ) AS v4ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip3 ), 0 ) AS v4ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip ), 0 ) AS v6ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip1 ), 0 ) AS v6ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip2 ), 0 ) AS v6ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip3 ), 0 ) AS v6ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT client_hostname FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip LIMIT 1 ), NULL ) AS client_hostname FROM metoo_mac mac WHERE tag = 'DT' ) mac
right join
metoo_terminal terminal on terminal.mac = mac.mac where mac.mac is null*/ /*and terminal.type = 0*/ SELECT terminal.id FROM ( SELECT * FROM metoo_mac mac WHERE tag in('DT', 'VDT') ) mac right join metoo_terminal terminal on terminal.mac = mac.mac/* and terminal.port = mac.port*/ where mac.mac is null

/* select DISTINCT(interfaceIndex), (select count(*) from metoo_terminal where (v4ip is not null and v6ip is null) ) as v4ip_count, (select count(*) from metoo_terminal where (v6ip is not null and v4ip is null) ) as v6ip_count,(select count(*) from metoo_terminal where (v6ip is not null and v4ip is not null) )as v4ip_v6ip_count from metoo_terminal *//*where (v6ip is not null and v4ip is not null)*/
SELECT DISTINCT (interfaceIndex), ( SELECT count(*) FROM metoo_terminal WHERE (v4ip IS NOT NULL AND v6ip IS NULL) and deviceTypeId not in(10, 24) ) AS v4ip_count, ( SELECT count(*) FROM metoo_terminal WHERE (v6ip IS NOT NULL AND v4ip IS NULL) and deviceTypeId not in(10, 24) ) AS v6ip_count, ( SELECT count(*) FROM metoo_terminal WHERE ( v6ip IS NOT NULL AND v4ip IS NOT NULL and deviceTypeId not in(10, 24) ) ) AS v4ip_v6ip_count FROM metoo_terminal

select terminal1.id, terminal2.v4ip as deviceIp from metoo_terminal terminal1 join ( select * from metoo_terminal where deviceType = 1 and deviceName like 'NSwitch%' group by deviceName )terminal2
on terminal1.deviceName = terminal2.deviceName
where terminal1.deviceType is null and terminal1.deviceIp is null
SELECT terminal.id, 0 as deviceType FROM metoo_terminal terminal JOIN metoo_ne ne ON terminal.v4ip = ne.ip

SELECT deviceName, CASE WHEN macVendor LIKE '%VMware%' THEN 'VMware' ELSE 'Other' END AS macVendorCategory, COUNT(*) AS count, v4ip FROM metoo_terminal where macVendor IS NOT NULL AND v4ip IS NOT NULL GROUP BY deviceName, macVendorCategory HAVING (macVendorCategory = 'Other' AND COUNT(*) = 1)

SELECT d1.id, d1.deviceIp, d1.deviceName, d1.deviceUuid, d1.deviceUuid2, d1.deviceTypeId, d1.v4ip, d1.v6ip, d1.mac, d1.vlan, d1.macVendor, d1.remoteDevice, d1.remotePort, d1.location, d1.duty, 3 AS deviceType, d1.combined_port_protocol, d1.combined_vendor_gen_family, d1.online,
d2.id d2_id, d2.deviceIp d2_deviceIp, d2.deviceName d2_deviceName, d2.deviceUuid d2_deviceUuid, d2.deviceUuid2 d2_deviceUuid2, -- 17 as d2_deviceTypeId, d2.deviceTypeId d2_deviceTypeId, d2.v4ip d2_v4ip, d2.v6ip d2_v6ip, d2.mac d2_mac, d2.vlan d2_vlan, d2.macVendor d2_macVendor, d2.remoteDevice d2_remoteDevice, d2.remotePort d2_remotePort, d2.location d2_location, d2.duty d2_duty, d2.deviceType d2_deviceType, d2.os d2_os, d2.combined_port_protocol d2_combined_port_protocol, d2.combined_vendor_gen_family d2_combined_vendor_gen_family, d2.online d2_online FROM ( SELECT * FROM metoo_terminal WHERE deviceUuid2 = #{deviceUuid} AND deviceName LIKE 'NSwitch%' AND deviceTypeId NOT IN (34, 9) AND online = 1 GROUP BY deviceUuid )d1 JOIN metoo_terminal d2 ON d2.deviceName = d1.deviceName AND d2.id != d1.id WHERE d2.deviceName LIKE 'NSwitch%' AND d2.online = 1

SELECT d1.id, d1.deviceIp, d1.deviceName, d1.deviceUuid, d1.deviceTypeId, d1.v4ip, d1.v6ip, d1.mac, d1.vlan, d1.macVendor, d1.remoteDevice, d1.remotePort, d1.location, d1.duty, 3 AS deviceType, d1.os, d1.combined_port_protocol, d1.combined_vendor_gen_family, d1.online,
d2.id d2_id, d2.deviceIp d2_deviceIp, d2.deviceName d2_deviceName, d2.deviceUuid d2_deviceUuid, -- 17 as d2_deviceTypeId, d2.deviceTypeId d2_deviceTypeId, d2.v4ip d2_v4ip, d2.v6ip d2_v6ip, d2.mac d2_mac, d2.vlan d2_vlan, d2.macVendor d2_macVendor, d2.remoteDevice d2_remoteDevice, d2.remotePort d2_remotePort, d2.location d2_location, d2.duty d2_duty, d2.deviceType d2_deviceType, d2.os d2_os, d2.combined_port_protocol d2_combined_port_protocol, d2.combined_vendor_gen_family d2_combined_vendor_gen_family, d2.online d2_online FROM ( SELECT * FROM metoo_terminal_history WHERE deviceUuid2 = #{deviceUuid} AND deviceName LIKE 'NSwitch%' AND deviceTypeId NOT IN (34, 9) GROUP BY deviceUuid )d1 JOIN metoo_terminal_history d2 ON d2.deviceName = d1.deviceName AND d2.id != d1.id WHERE d2.deviceName LIKE 'NSwitch%' AND d2.addTime = ( SELECT addTime FROM metoo_terminal_history WHERE addTime <= #{time} ORDER BY addTime DESC limit 1 )
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO metoo_terminal
addTime,
mac,
port,
deviceIp,
deviceName,
deviceUuid,
tag,
type,
hostname,
remoteDevice,
remotePort,
v4ip,
v4ip1,
v4ip2,
v4ip3,
v6ip,
v6ip1,
v6ip2,
v6ip3,
macVendor,
online,
client_hostname,
name,
interfaceName,
index,
uuid,
interfaceIndex,
interfaceStatus,
remoteInterface,
remoteUuid,
vendor,
vlan,
duty,
location,
purchase_time,
warranty_time,
price,
serial_number,
asset_number,
description,
change_reasons,
`from`,
projectId,
vendorId,
model,
deviceTypeId,
#{addTime},
#{mac},
#{port},
#{deviceIp},
#{deviceName},
#{deviceUuid},
#{tag},
#{type},
#{hostname},
#{remoteDevice},
#{remotePort},
#{v4ip},
#{v4ip1},
#{v4ip2},
#{v4ip3},
#{v6ip},

#{v6ip2},
#{v6ip3},
#{macVendor},
#{online},
#{client_hostname},
#{name},
#{interfaceName},
#{index},
#{uuid},
#{interfaceIndex},
#{interfaceStatus},
#{remoteInterface},
#{remoteUuid},
#{vendor},
#{vlan},
#{duty},
#{location},

#{from},

#{vendorId},
#{model},
#{deviceTypeId},
mapper.update:
UPDATE metoo_terminal
addTime = #{addTime},
updateTime = #{updateTime},
`name` = #{name},
mac = #{mac},
port = #{port},
deviceIp = #{deviceIp},
deviceName = #{deviceName},
deviceUuid = #{deviceUuid},
tag = #{tag},
`type` = #{type},
hostname = #{hostname},
remoteDevice = #{remoteDevice},
remotePort = #{remotePort},
v4ip = #{v4ip},
v4ip1 = #{v4ip1},
v4ip2 = #{v4ip2},
v4ip3 = #{v4ip3},
v6ip = #{v6ip},
v6ip1 = #{v6ip1},
v6ip2 = #{v6ip2},
v6ip3 = #{v6ip3},
macVendor = #{macVendor},
online = #{online},
client_hostname = #{client_hostname},
interfaceName = #{interfaceName},
index = #{index},
uuid = #{uuid},
interfaceIndex = #{interfaceIndex},
interfaceStatus = #{interfaceStatus},
remoteInterface = #{remoteInterface},
remoteUuid = #{remoteUuid},
vendor = #{vendor},
vlan = #{vlan},
duty = #{duty},
location = #{location},
purchase_time = #{purchase_time},
warranty_time = #{warranty_time},
price = #{price},
serial_number = #{serial_number},
asset_number = #{asset_number},
description = #{description},
changeReasons = #{changeReasons},
`from` = #{from},
projectId = #{projectId},
vendorId = #{vendorId},
model = #{model},
deviceTypeId = #{deviceTypeId},
unitId = #{unitId},
scan_port_number = #{scan_port_number},
scan_vendor = #{scan_vendor},
scan_os_famify = #{scan_os_famify},
scan_os_gen = #{scan_os_gen},
scan_application_protocol = #{scan_application_protocol},
combined_port_protocol = #{combined_port_protocol},
combined_vendor_gen_family = #{combined_vendor_gen_family},
os = #{os},
deviceType = #{deviceType},
deviceUuid2 = #{deviceUuid2},
deviceName2 = #{deviceName2},
deviceIp2 = #{deviceIp2},
devicePort2 = #{devicePort2},
macVendor = #{macVendor},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE metoo_terminal d1 JOIN ( SELECT deviceName, deviceUuid2, PORT, v4ip, COUNT( CASE WHEN macVendor LIKE 'VMware%' THEN 1 END ) AS vmwareCount, COUNT( CASE WHEN macVendor NOT LIKE 'VMware%' OR macVendor IS NULL THEN 1 END ) AS otherCount FROM metoo_terminal GROUP BY deviceName, PORT HAVING vmwareCount >= 1 -- 至少有一条包含 'VMware' 的记录 AND otherCount = 1 ) AS d2 ON d1.deviceName = d2.deviceName AND d1.port = d2.port -- 只更新符合条件的记录 SET d1.deviceTypeId = 34, d1.deviceUuid = d1.deviceUuid2 WHERE d1.macVendor NOT LIKE 'VMware%' OR macVendor IS NULL;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO `metoo_terminal` ( addTime, mac, port, type, deviceIp, deviceName, deviceUuid, tag, hostname, remoteDevice, remotePort, remoteUuid, v4ip, v4ip1, v4ip2, v4ip3, v4ipDynamic, v4ip1Dynamic, v4ip2Dynamic, v4ip3Dynamic, v6ip, v6ip1, v6ip2, v6ip3, v6ipDynamic, v6ip1Dynamic, v6ip2Dynamic, v6ip3Dynamic, online, client_hostname, uuid, deviceTypeId, macVendor, deviceUuid2, deviceName2, deviceIp2, devicePort2 ) VALUES
( #{item.addTime}, #{item.mac}, #{item.port}, #{item.type}, #{item.deviceIp}, #{item.deviceName}, #{item.deviceUuid}, #{item.tag}, #{item.hostname}, #{item.remoteDevice}, #{item.remotePort}, #{item.remoteUuid}, #{item.v4ip}, #{item.v4ip1}, #{item.v4ip2}, #{item.v4ip3}, #{item.v4ipDynamic}, #{item.v4ip1Dynamic}, #{item.v4ip2Dynamic}, #{item.v4ip3Dynamic}, #{item.v6ip}, #{item.v6ip1}, #{item.v6ip2}, #{item.v6ip3}, #{item.v6ipDynamic}, #{item.v6ip1Dynamic}, #{item.v6ip2Dynamic}, #{item.v6ip3Dynamic}, #{item.online}, #{item.client_hostname}, #{item.uuid}, #{item.deviceTypeId}, #{item.macVendor}, #{item.deviceUuid2}, #{item.deviceName2}, #{item.deviceIp2}, #{item.devicePort2} )

update.foreach:
UPDATE metoo_terminal
addTime = #{item.addTime},
updateTime = #{item.updateTime},
online = #{item.online},
port = #{item.port},
deviceIp = #{item.deviceIp},
deviceName = #{item.deviceName},
deviceUuid = #{item.deviceUuid},
remoteDevice = #{item.remoteDevice},
remotePort = #{item.remotePort},
remoteUuid = #{item.remoteUuid},
deviceTypeId = #{item.deviceTypeId},
v4ip = #{item.v4ip},
v4ip1 = #{item.v4ip1},
v4ip2 = #{item.v4ip2},
v4ip3 = #{item.v4ip3},
v6ip = #{item.v6ip},
v6ip1 = #{item.v6ip1},
v6ip2 = #{item.v6ip2},
v6ip3 = #{item.v6ip3},
v4ipDynamic = #{item.v4ipDynamic},
v4ip1Dynamic = #{item.v4ip1Dynamic},
v4ip2Dynamic = #{item.v4ip2Dynamic},
v4ip3Dynamic = #{item.v4ip3Dynamic},
v6ipDynamic = #{item.v6ipDynamic},
v6ip1Dynamic = #{item.v6ip1Dynamic},
v6ip2Dynamic = #{item.v6ip2Dynamic},
v6ip3Dynamic = #{item.v6ip3Dynamic},
client_hostname = #{item.client_hostname},
hostname = #{item.hostname},
macVendor = #{item.macVendor},
WHERE id = #{item.id}

mapper.update: INSERT INTO metoo_terminal_history SELECT * FROM metoo_terminal
